title: City Views, Perfect Location, Impressive Amenities
posting_body: ["388 Beale offers sensational amenities, premier resident services and spacious apartment homes in San Francisco's financial district.", 'Visit our website: <URL> to view our availability and pricing, take a 3D Tour of this apartment or schedule your preference of a virtually guided or self-guided tour.', "We can't wait to show you what 388 Beale has in store as your new home!", 'Pricing may vary based on lease terms, move-in date, availability, and is subject to change at any time.', 'Offered prices are for base rent only as other changes, fees, terms, and conditions may apply.', 'Square footage, amenities, and floor plan listed may vary between individual units and are subject to availability.', 'Deposits may fluctuate based on credit, rental history, income, and other qualifying standards.', 'Occupancy guidelines may apply.', 'Equal housing opportunity provider.', 'Photos are representative of our community, and may not be the exact home advertised.', 'Please reach us to view and select your new home!', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.', 'The buildings catch your eye from blocks away.', 'Two towers rising up from a central entrance atrium.', 'With striking views of the Bay Bridge and the surrounding downtown Financial District, 388 Beale apartment homes offer a one-of-a-kind experience in upscale, city living.', 'Featuring a host of amenities and attentive service, these luxury apartments in San Francisco offer spacious floor plans with floor-to-ceiling windows, private balconies, hardwood flooring, wood-burning fireplaces, a fitness center, whirlpool spa, and sauna.', 'Enjoy living in the most dynamic of city locales with Rincon Hill and the downtown business district right outside your door.', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>', '388 Beale, managed by UDR', '388 Beale Street', 'San Francisco, CA 94105', 'show contact info', 'Community Features', '* Community Lounge', '* Disability Access', '* TV Lounge', '* Bark Park', '* Pet Salon', '* EV Charging', '* Guest Parking', '* Extra Storage', '* Garage Parking', '* Package Acceptance', '* Reserved Parking', '* Billiards', '* Sun Deck', '* Community Kitchen', '* Sauna', '* Landscaped Courtyards', '* Fitness Studio', '* Spa', '* Controlled Access Parking', '* Bike Racks', '*', "Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.", 'Call for details.', '* After-Hours Emergency Maintenance', '* Concierge Service', '* Foosball', '* WiFi Access', '* Dry Cleaning and Laundry Service', '* Multi Function Study Rooms with Copier and Computers', '* Cardio Room', '* Smoke Free Community', '* Yoga Lounge', '* Controlled Access', '* Outdoor Grill Area', '* Car Share Program Onsite', '* Green Recycling Center']
